name: ANCHORS DEEP
description:
Anchors Deep is a stylized action adventure game with a focus on combat and strong narrative themes. There is one tutorial and 3 mini levels with engaging combat that ramps up as the player travels through the game. The strong narrative elements like NPCs and voiceovers clue the player into how they’re perceived in the game. While the audiovisual design of the game is zany and dark, the dialogue conveys a more lighthearted, comedic tone.

THE STORY:

For thousands and thousands years, Fishnity has lived under Humanity’s shadow. Massacred, tortured, and even eaten!

The massacre on Fishnity never ends and they have no choice but escape the grasp of the evil Trident Seafood Corporation!

Now, with the heinous corporation’s new technology, Fishnity has no way to escape, and no place to hide. They need their hero again, the one who fought with everything and suddenly disappeared thousands of years ago — they need the legendary Fish Guardian..

After the years of brutal torture and harm on his people, the Fish Guardian awakens! Ready to exact his revenge against the humans! However, something feels different? He doesn’t seem to be too passionate about it! Too many years have passed since his last awakening, he’s rusty, tired and a little out of shape! Now he needs to re-learn his skills by tearing down whatever stands in his way.

CREDITS: 

Anchors Deep is a semester long project for the NYU Game Center, below are the students who were involved in the development of the game for the Major Studio Spring class. 

  • Apple Li (UI Design / Level Design ) 
  • Bader AlQahtani (Combat Design / Programming) 
  • Cassie Hui (Narrative Design / Project Management) 
  • Edith Chen (Visual Design / Level Design) 
  • Eva Wang (Visual Design) 
  • Frank Mengfan Huang (Narrative Design) 
  • May Li (Visual Design) 
  • Peter Seo (UI Design / Logo Design / Level Design) 

CONTROLS:

A gamepad is highly recommended for the best experience.

Keyboard:

  • Move - WASD
  • Camera - Mouse
  • Attack - Left Mouse Button
  • Air Launch - Right Mouse Button
  • Jump - Space Bar
  • Character Interaction - Q
  • Fishhook - R
  • Guard/Parry - E

NOTE: This game is built ONLY for Windows Operating Systems.
